page.title: 09PARTNEY SHEEP FAIR
page.content: The Sheep Fair comes around to Partney every year on the 1st of August. People come from all over the North of England to buy and sell sheep.They start arriving at 4 o'clock in the morning.The sheep come in great big double decker lorries or some pulling trailers.Its held in a field opposite the school.Every year before it is held I help them to put the fences up. It is very hard work keeping the sheep in the pens and at the end we have to get them back in the lorries. The sheep fair has been here for hundreds of years.Many years ago it was bigger with market stalls and side shows.
